component.name: retrieveEntity
component.description: TO returns data for a specific entity instance with the primary key value or or alternate key of entity type.

component.name: retrieveSpecificProperties
component.description: To retrieves specific properties for the specific entity with the primary key value.

component.name: retrieveSingleProperty
component.description: To returns only the value of the specific property of a entity type.

component.name: retrieveNavigationPropertyValues
component.description: To retrieve the data of an entity using single valued navigation property or collection valued navigation property.

component.name: retrieveByExpandingNavigationProperties
component.description: The expand query option to control what data from related entities is returned.
